GSD.description:
xprtrdma: treat all calls not a bcall when bc_serv is NULL

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.198 by commit da99331fa62131a38a0947a8204c5208de7b0454. For more details please see the references link.
